__e: Because I did love you and... I couldn't...
I remember thinking that I really liked him, but I didn't want to go to bed with your boyfriend, Hm.
And I-I wanted you close because I really loved you.
I was gonna tell you I love you, and I ain't never said that to nobody, except this one guy before.
I said I loved you and you didn't say it back and I said it was fine, but it wasn't.
I did it to save you, darling, because I love you. I still do, more than ever.
Why were you so weird when I told you I liked you?
You haven't yet realized... that I love you... beyond what is pretty to look at.
I liked you for a while, but now I can"t stand looking at you.
And I don't think I would have done what I did if I didn't really love you.
It's like she doesn't love you right now, Paul, but that's not to say she might not fall in love with you later.
I cut you in, a stranger, a nobody - not because I liked you, not because I trusted you, but because my sister asked me to, and I like to put a smile on her face.
Because I was mad at you! Not because I stopped loving you!
But I wouldn't have done what I did if I didn't still love you.
And when I finally talk to my father many months later on the phone he says, " I loved you more when you were dead."
First is that I was so in love with you, it nearly killed me.
I loved you so much, in fact, that it was just... shy of enough.
